name: Haunty - The Friendly Dekstop Ghost
description:
Haunty The Friendly Desktop Ghost Haunty is a cute little ghost who lives on your dekstop. He likes chocolate, spoopy memes and haunting your computer in a cute and a harmless way. What can Haunty Do:
  • Eat Chocolate
  • Bring you Spoopy Memes
  • Dance
  • Fly Around
  • Sing a song

How to close: Right Click on Haunty and choose "Shutdown Haunty"
